/* SQL_ID : go.gg.cms.core.commonMenu.findMenuCache */
WITH RECURSIVE MENU_LIST (id, disp_cd, parent_id, disp_seq, link_url, link_type, icon_type, use_yn, depth, path_id, path_cd, path_name, path_seq, cycle) AS ( SELECT a.id::TEXT , a.disp_cd::TEXT , a.parent_id::TEXT , a.disp_seq , a.link_url , a.link_type , a.icon_type , a.use_yn , 1 AS depth , ARRAY[a.id::TEXT] , ARRAY[a.disp_cd::TEXT] , ARRAY['ROOT'::TEXT] , ARRAY[a.disp_seq::TEXT] , false , false , false FROM tb_menu a WHERE a.disp_cd = 'ROOT' AND a.parent_id IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT a.id::TEXT , a.disp_cd::TEXT , a.parent_id::TEXT , a.disp_seq , a.link_url , a.link_type , a.icon_type , a.use_yn , b.depth + 1 , ARRAY_APPEND(b.path_id, a.id::TEXT) , ARRAY_APPEND(b.path_cd, a.disp_cd::TEXT) , ARRAY_APPEND(b.path_name, ml.name::TEXT) , ARRAY_APPEND(b.path_seq, a.disp_seq::TEXT) , a.id::TEXT = ANY(b.path_id) , a.disp_cd::TEXT = ANY(b.path_cd) , a.disp_seq::TEXT = ANY(b.path_seq) FROM tb_menu AS a INNER JOIN tb_menu_ml AS ml ON a.id = ml.parent_id INNER JOIN MENU_LIST AS b ON a.parent_id::TEXT = b.id AND a.del_yn = 'N'
AND a.use_yn = 'Y'
AND ml.lang_cd = 'ko' AND NOT CYCLE ) SELECT mn.id , mn.disp_cd AS cd , mn.parent_id , ml.name , ml.short_desc AS shrt_desc , ml.long_desc AS long_desc , mn.disp_seq AS seq , mn.use_yn , mn.depth , mn.link_url , mn.link_type , mn.icon_type , regexp_replace(REPLACE(mn.path_id::TEXT, ',', '.'), '[}{"]', '', 'g') AS path_id , regexp_replace(REPLACE(mn.path_cd::TEXT, ',', '.'), '[}{"]', '', 'g') AS path_cd , regexp_replace(REPLACE(mn.path_name::TEXT, ',', '.'), '[}{"]', '', 'g') AS path_name , mn.path_seq , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tb_menu a WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' AND mn.id = a.parent_id::TEXT) AS child_cnt FROM MENU_LIST AS mn LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_menu_ml AS ml ON mn.id = ml.parent_id::TEXT WHERE ml.lang_cd = 'ko' /* ORDER BY path_seq */ ORDER BY seq

/* SQL_ID : go.gg.cms.core.commonMenu.findFirstDepth */
SELECT mn.id , mn.disp_cd AS cd , mn.parent_id , ml.name , ml.short_desc AS shrt_desc , ml.long_desc AS long_desc , mn.disp_seq AS seq , mn.use_yn , mn.link_url , mn.link_type , mn.icon_type , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tb_menu a WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' AND mn.id = a.parent_id) AS child_cnt FROM tb_menu AS mn LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_menu_ml AS ml ON mn.id = ml.parent_id WHERE mn.parent_id = (SELECT id FROM tb_menu WHERE disp_cd = 'ROOT' AND parent_id IS NULL LIMIT 1) AND mn.del_yn = 'N' AND ml.lang_cd = 'ko' ORDER BY mn.disp_seq

/* SQL_ID : go.gg.cms.core.commonMenu.findFirstDepth */
SELECT id FROM tb_menu WHERE disp_cd = 'ROOT' AND parent_id IS NULL LIMIT 1

/* SQL_ID : go.gg.cms.core.commonMenu.findById */
SELECT mn.id , mn.disp_cd AS cd , mn.parent_id , ml.name , ml.short_desc AS shrt_desc , ml.long_desc AS long_desc , mn.disp_seq AS seq , mn.use_yn , mn.link_url , mn.link_type , mn.icon_type , (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM tb_menu a WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' AND mn.id = a.parent_id) AS child_cnt FROM tb_menu AS mn LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_menu_ml AS ml ON mn.id = ml.parent_id WHERE mn.id = #{id}::uuid AND mn.del_yn = 'N' AND ml.lang_cd = 'ko'
